sentences: Lee aka ndị mmadụ si anata ntụ n'Ash Wednesday nke afọ a
Ụkọchukwu ga-etinye ntụ n'aka ndị mmadụ ka ha were aka ha dee n'egedege ihu ha
Ndị mmadụ ji aka ha etinye onwe ha ntụ na Ash Wednesday nke afọ a n'ihi ọrịa coronavirus
Nwaagbọghọ ọzọ ji aka ya etinye onwe ya ntụ
Ma ụkọchukwu ma ndị ụka kpuchichara ihu ha
Nwaokorobịa a ejirila aka ya gbuo onwe ya ntụ
